data.message:
Hello, I hope you are well and that we will soon have your news.
With you forever for all that you have accomplished and what you will still accomplish. Thank you for before, for now and for tomorrow. Thank you for this rare courage you have always shown, a model for those who are still fighting and who for you, as a sign of respect and just return, to your attention, will never give up. Excellent week to you !!!

replies.message: on a toute la meme chose sur le coeur tkt eva
